themes: lack of infrastructure for media art
support for ongoing media art exhibitions and public commissions
peer networking for artist-run spaces and creative entrepreneurs
key_phrases: Austin lacks dedicated infrastructure for media art and artist-led initiatives
ACME could fill this gap by supporting ongoing media art exhibitions, public commissions, and training in emerging technologies

barriers_identified: lack of dedicated infrastructure for media art
solutions_proposed: creating a mastermind group for artist-run spaces and creative entrepreneurs
fostering peer networks for knowledge-sharing and sustainability
